text: Walden is a book written by the author, Henry David Thoreau. This book is a satire. This book is also a book on the author's life and experiences. == Counterparts == *Walden (Wow! Wow! Wubbzy!) Category:American literature Category:Spiritual books Category:Non-fiction books Category:1854 in the United States Category:1850s books
title: Walden
